coded_answer.p: I have received your letter, which was about that you would like me to inform you.

As you know, a hotel whose name iscalled the Palace Hotel has been booked for your group. The best way to get from there to the conference is to take a taxi. I am afraid there are no buses to get there.

We will have a great party at the end of the conference. The party will be formal, therefore you havewill have to wear formal clothes like a suit or a dress. As you know, it is not suitable to wear a jeanjeans or something similar.

On your last day you have anthe afternoon free. In my area there is a fantastic park, which is the most famous park in the country. You can find a lot of things to do or to see. You can visit the zoo or walk around the amazing lake in the park.
I hope you will find all the details, which you would like to have in the letter. If you need any more information, please let me know.
How much can a computer affect your life? I think it effectsaffects you more than you think.

When I was a child I always wanted to get the lyrics of the songs that I liked, but it was nearly impossible to have them. I felt the lack of them. I first bought a computer aswhen I was in university. It was sovery necessary for me because I wanted to be a computer programmer. At Thatthat time I metentered the magic world of computers. Linking to the internetInternet was so popular. The Internet was something amazing for me. Can you thinkimagine you have every piece of information you need whenever you want it? Can you thinkimagine you can contact with anyone who is from any country whenever you want to?

I meet a lot of people on the internetInternet and it really interestinterests me. I learn a lot about their culture by speaking to them on the internetInternet. I wasn't able to imagine this before. In addition to this, today companies can do nothing without a computer. Everything in this world workswill work with computers from now on.
Computers changedhave changed my life stylelifestyle, my opinionopinions about the world. And they effectaffect everyone's life directly or indirectly.
